Are we meeting your expectations?\nDo you have any feedback or suggestions on how to serve you better? We would like to hear it.\nKindly tell us in the box below.

You can sign up for self-service portal by clicking the Signup button on the home page or the activation link sent in the email you received when you signed up for service with ipNX. The following are the steps to sign up.
 1. Enter your customer ID.
 2. Enter the email you provided when signing up for service with ipNX.
 3. Enter the username you would prefer to use on the portal.
 4. Enter your choice of password.
 5. Click on Submit button.
 6. A secret code will be sent to the email address you entered.
 7. Enter the secret code sent in your email in the input field.
 8. Click on Submit button.

You can change your password following the steps below:
 1. Click on My Profile.
 2. Click on Change Password.
 3. Enter Current Passsword.
 4. Enter New Password.
 5. Enter Password Confirmation.
 6. Click Change Password button.
